sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="People Info Default">690362c73b1e3210bc1ccdd643e45a05</macroponent><name>body_spouse_id_card/now_default/text</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api
}) {
    const obj = api.item.value;

    let title = '';
    if (obj.title_name._reference) {
        title = obj.title_name._reference.title_name_en.value || "";
    } else {
        const objTitle = api.data.look_up_title_name.results.find(item => item._row_data.uniqueValue === obj.title_name.value);
        title = objTitle.title_name_en.displayValue || "";
    }
 
    const firstName = obj.first_name_en.value || "";
    const lastName = obj.last_name_en.value || "";

    return `${title} ${firstName} ${lastName}`.trim();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-16 14:35:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>fc76886c3beafa10bc1ccdd643e45a62</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>body_spouse_id_card/now_default/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fc76886c3beafa10bc1ccdd643e45a62</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-16 14:35:41</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
